Title: Thanks Ungiven
Plot: When everyone ends up at Baze?s loft for Thanksgiving, it isn?t long before a few big secrets are exposed. Baze worries that his father, Jack, will discover he is dating his boss, Emma; Lux worries that her parents will find out she is spending time with Eric; Tasha worries that something very dark from her not-too-distant past will be discovered; and Cate worries that if she tells Ryan the truth it will further complicate their already complicated relationship.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Robin Thomas, Emma Caulfield, Shaun Sipos, Ksenia Solo
